name: 1200: Double Hit - Two Color Dots Addictive Puzzle
name_original: 1200: Double Hit - Two Color Dots Addictive Puzzle
description:
***NEW from the creators of the Hit Game 1200***

Join the game, and get to the 1200 level! Put all the dots to the target.
Get to the 1200 level, and reach a high score!

Are you ready, adventurer? Let’s go!

WHY YOU’LL LOVE 1200: DOUBLE HIT

• FREE to play!
• CHALLENGE yourself with 1200 NEW levels, two times harder but two times more exciting!
• ENJOY simple, thoughtful gameplay where you connect one Dot to another and play at your pace
• SOLVE all the levels and test your patience
• TRAVEL through beautiful levels in prisma style in the world of 1200: Double Hit
• PLAY beautifully and become a champion

If you loved 1200, you’ll love 1200: Double Hit: where you will feel new wave of addictive madness of the game about tiny dots and spines.

*Game is color blind friendly*
1200 is just our vision of addictive game.
And we hope it will be a good fun for you, to play 1200 game.


CONNECT WITH US!

Join Us: http://vk.com/indigobunting
Follow Us: http://twitter.com/indigobuntingEN (@indigobuntingEN)


GAME CENTER
